Things to try out Here are some of the many things \n you can ask Alexa To learn more and access additional features, download the Amazon Alexa App. Alexa, what\'s the weather? Alexa, play my Flash Briefing. Alexa, what are some top rated \nIndian restaurants? Alexa, set Timer for 20 mins.
Sign in to your Amazon account to enable Alexa Voice Service features.
English (US) English (UK) Deutsch Amazon Alexa
Something went wrong , please try again later. Permission to record audio is required to instruct Alexa, please goto app settings and enable \'Microphone\' permission Speaker MIC is ON
//location enable strings Get Started You need to allow location permission to detect speaker Wi-Fi Discovery Add Tutorials No speaker found Make sure all of your speakers are connected to the same Wi-Fi and refresh Refresh Using the speaker for the first time? Setup New Speaker Speaker Setup Setup Instructions 1 Power on Riva Voice speaker Go to Wi-Fi settings and select \'RIVAACONCERT_xxxxxx\' from the Wi-Fi list 2 3 After connecting to the Riva Voice speaker, return to the Riva Voice app & click next Wi-Fi Settings Speaker Name Connect speaker to Wi-Fi network Select a Wi-Fi Wi-Fi Password Hmmm… We are not able to make sure whether the speaker setup has completed. If the speaker light is white. Make sure your phone is connected to the same Wi-Fi network* If the speaker light is blinking white. You might have entered incorrect Wi-Fi password* If the speaker light is blinking colors. The updating is still going on, please wait a few minutes. *You can start the setup again by resetting your speaker. OK, I got it To enable voice commands & Amazon services, please login with Amazon account. Sign in with Amazon I will sign in later Your speaker has been set up successfully. Congrats! No Wi-Fi results available Amazon Login Login with Amazon Your speaker includes access to Alexa. Connect your Amazon account to access personalized features. Alexa allows you to use your voice to play music and get news, sorts scores, weather and more- all hands-free. All you have to do is ask Alexa. amazon alexa Password cannot be empty Invalid Wi-Fi password Enter speaker name Configuring Speaker… Setting up speaker & looking for update Connected Speakers Speaker is ready for commands Logout Riva Voice Login to enable voice commands Speaker is ready for commands Listening … You need to login to Amazon to enable speech commands https://rivaaudio.com/Alexa-tutorial/en/index.html Version Language English Bass Treble System Firmware Host Firmware Away Mode Info Edit Network Name Alexa settings Logged In Alexa Locale Speech Volume Follow Off Volume Software Update On Select locale for Alexa Logged Out MAC Address General settings Please turn on WiFi to discover streaming speakers You need to allow microphone permission to instruct Alexa Location must be turned on to detect speaker Wi-Fi My Device USB Storage Other input types Aux Amazon Alexa account not connected Music
